abstract: William A. Ackman, the hedge fund manager who has rarely shied from a challenge, appears to have identified the two companies he would like to shake up next: J.C. Penney and Fortune Brands, the owner of the Jim Beam whiskey and Titleist golf brands.
snippet: William A. Ackman, the hedge fund manager who has rarely shied from a challenge, appears to have identified the two companies he would like to shake up next: J.C. Penney and Fortune Brands, the owner of the Jim Beam whiskey and Titleist golf brand...

headline.main: Ackman Buys Into Penney and Fortune

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
